title: São Bartolomeu (Ribeira and Porto de)
body: The river that bears this name originates in the plateau of Paul da Serra and serves as the dividing line between the parishes of Calheta and Estreito da Calheta, flowing into the ocean. At its mouth, there is an insignificant port, known by the name of Porto da Ribeira, not far from Ponta da Galé.

Paul da Serra: Where the river originates, serving as the dividing line between the parishes of Calheta and Estreito da Calheta.
